text: Anna Favella (September 21, 1983) is an Italian actress. She works in television and movies. She is known for roles in the TV series Terra ribelle and in the movie Mr. America. == Early life == Anna Favella was born and raised in Rome. == Career == Favella started acting when she was very young. Her first minor roles were in programs such as Enrico Mattei - L'uomo che guardava al future and Don Matteo 7. Her first major role was in a TV series called Terra Ribelle, where she played the role of the main character, Elena Marsili. In 2013, Favella was the main character in the movie Mr. America. == Filmography == Year Title Role Notes 2008 Enrico Mattei - L'uomo che guardava al futuro Priscilla Leoni TV series 2009 Don Matteo 7 Gaia TV series (1 episode: "L'Anniversario") 2010 Terra ribelle Elena Marsili TV series 2012 Terra Ribelle - Il Nuovo mondo Elena Marsili TV series 2013 Mr America Penelope Morningstar movie Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Rome
title: Anna Favella
